display_help: The Crey can place a Time Bomb on the ground. The Time Bomb will detonate 15 seconds after being placed. The resulting explosion is massive, and can devastate everyone nearby and send them flying. The Time Bomb is small, and almost impossible to detect, however it is fragile and may be set off by an enemies fire. Even if destroyed, the Bomb will still detonate.
